TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositeTableKey extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A contains one or more keys used to identify a single row in a table. The string format of a is a comma separated list (without LWS) of optionally single-quoted terms. The terms only have to be quoted if they contain a comma.
